software.description:
The INIA19 primate brain atlas was created from over 100 structural MR scans of 19 rhesus macaque animals. The atlas currently comprises high-resolution T1-weighted average MR images with and without skull stripping, tissue probability maps, and a detailed parcellation map based on the NeuroMaps atlas.

INIA19 was created by researchers of the NIH-funded Integrative Neuroscience Initiative on Alcoholism (INIA).
